Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from GBVA non-structutal protein 5A)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.23175359]hepatitis C virus(Jc1-Luc HCVcc):inhibition of virus entry in Huh7.5.1 cells(IC50=10 μM,88% inhibition at 20 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented

Literature.Title: Screening and rational design of hepatitis C virus entry inhibitory peptides derived from GB virus A NS5A.
Literature.Author: Liu X, Huang Y, Cheng M, Pan L, Si Y, Li G, Niu Y, Zhao L, Zhao J, Li X, Chen Y, Yang W.
